tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE investment_portfolios (
    portfolio_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    portfolio_name VARCHAR(255),
    total_investment DECIMAL(10,2),
    performance_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE investment_portfolio (portfolio_id INT, portfolio_name VARCHAR(255), owner_id INT, date_created DATE) 
CREATE TABLE performance_report (report_id INT, portfolio_id INT, report_date DATE, performance_metric VARCHAR(255))

CREATE TABLE investments (
    investment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    portfolio_id UUID NOT NULL,
    investment_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL(18,2) NOT NULL,
    purchase_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE investment (
  investment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  investment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  investment_type VARCHAR(50),
  investment_amount NUMERIC,
  investment_date TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE portfolio (    id INT PRIMARY KEY,    name TEXT NOT NULL,    date_created DATE NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE portfolio_holdings (    id INT PRIMARY KEY,    portfolio_id INT NOT NULL,    symbol TEXT NOT NULL,    quantity INT NOT NULL,    purchase_price DECIMAL NOT NULL,    FOREIGN KEY (portfolio_id) REFERENCES portfolio(id) );

CREATE TABLE performance_reports (    id INT PRIMARY KEY,    portfolio_id INT NOT NULL,    report_date DATE NOT NULL,    total_returns DECIMAL NOT NULL,    FOREIGN KEY (portfolio_id) REFERENCES portfolio(id) );

CREATE TABLE investment_transactions (    id INT PRIMARY KEY,    portfolio_id INT NOT NULL,    transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,    transaction_type TEXT NOT NULL,    amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,    FOREIGN KEY (portfolio_id) REFERENCES portfolio(id) );
CREATE TABLE portfolio_managers (    id INT PRIMARY KEY,    name TEXT NOT NULL,    experience_years INT NOT NULL );
